hero.name: Miguel Toyas Pernichi
hero.title: Frontend Developer at ResMed
hero.subtitle: Building healthcare platforms with React & TypeScript while founding EquiRoster

about.title: About Me
about.description: Frontend Developer at ResMed building medical software that 20,000+ people use every week. I work primarily with React and TypeScript, but my full-stack foundation means I can jump into backend conversations without breaking a sweat.
about.description_2: Currently founding EquiRoster alongside my day job - leading 4 developers to tackle the scheduling chaos in restaurants. My engineering background taught me to solve problems methodically, but in tech I've learned that sometimes the best solution is the one that actually ships.
about.description_3: Based in Dublin, collaborating daily with teams across four continents. Fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. I care about building things that work reliably and don't fall apart when people actually use them.

job1.title: Frontend Developer
job1.description: Engineering complex business functionality for healthcare platform serving 20,000+ weekly users, implementing data processing logic and critical workflows. Building system integrations and API implementations with React and TypeScript, ensuring regulatory compliance in medical environments. Recently boosted testing coverage from 1.2% to 35% using Jest and GitHub Actions. Collaborating with international teams across Dublin, Sydney, Bangalore, and San Diego to deliver features for both public platform and internal admin tools supporting healthcare providers.

job2.title: Teacher Assistant | Full Stack Developer
job2.description: Mentored 50+ students in React, Python, Flask, achieving 90% completion rate. Delivered technical lectures on React hooks, database design, and API development. Developed supplementary coding exercises and production-ready projects to enhance learning outcomes.

job3.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
job3.description: Implemented features using Elixir and Phoenix for scalable web platform. Optimized database queries and backend processes with PostgreSQL. Collaborated with cross-functional team to improve system performance and user experience using LiveView and TailwindCSS.

project1.title: EquiRoster - AI-Powered Workforce Scheduling
project1.description: Founding and leading development of EquiRoster, an AI-powered workforce scheduling platform for the hospitality industry. Managing a team of 4 developers while conducting market validation with 10+ restaurant managers. Building comprehensive scheduling solution with workforce optimization algorithms and intuitive management interface.

project2.title: LIQUIBOXES - E-commerce Platform
project2.description: Led development team for innovative e-commerce platform featuring personalized mystery boxes and vendor management. Built comprehensive solution with secure payment processing (Stripe), real-time inventory tracking, and personalized recommendation algorithms. Awarded Best Project at 4Geeks Academy.

project3.title: YO LO CUIDO - Pet Care Platform
project3.description: Developed responsive platform connecting pet owners with caregivers using React and modern development practices. Implemented custom hooks, Context API for state management, real-time notifications, and secure user authentication with intuitive booking system.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: Always open to interesting conversations - whether about new opportunities, EquiRoster collaboration, or just geeking out about tech. Currently exploring remote roles and excited to chat about what's next.
contact.description.2: Working on something cool? Need a developer? Want to grab a coffee (virtual or real)? Just drop me a line. I'm pretty responsive and love meeting new people in the tech space.
contact.name: Miguel Toyas Pernichi
